ygData.subject: Re: Need Help
ygData.msgSnippet: I tried to transfer characters between accounts and Verant said they couldn t do that due exactly to the selling of characters thing, so when I started my new
ygData.messageBody:
I tried to transfer characters between accounts
and Verant said they couldn't do that due exactly to
the selling of characters thing, so when I started my
new account (couldn't get my wife off the other one
long enough to let me play) I had to start over with a
new character. Also it is true that the only way to
transfer a character to another server is when they split,
this is to maintain the balance of items and other
special equipment on the servers.<br><br>Uinan
D'Mortuus<br>20th season Shadow Knight of Erolissi Marr
